name: AVPlayerViewControlsStyle
desc: Constants that indicate which user interface controls the view displays.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The view displays no playback controls.

items.name: case inline
items.desc: The view displays playback controls in a bar along the view’s bottom edge.

items.name: case floating
items.desc: The view displays playback controls in a floating window over the video content.

items.name: case minimal
items.desc: The view presents basic controls to play and pause playback.
